page.title: 05EDUCATION IN BROUGHTY FERRY
page.content: {NURSERY }This area is well served with a variety of nursery and playgroup facilities. Mothers usually assist in the running of these nurseries on a rota basis. {SCHOOLS }Three Primary Schools, Eastern, Forthill and Barnhill, cater for just over one thousand pupils in the 5 - 12 year old range. Eastern Primary is housed in a very old but refurbished building. Barnhill and Forthill are more modern, purpose- built schools. Forthill is the largest Primary School. Grove Academy caters for children in the 12-18 year old range with nearly 1000 pupils.The school building is due for modernisation.
